title: Some of My Travels
name: Some of My Travels
description:
A Map by Jason

As I recall them, or find photos, or writings, I'll post more memories from my travels.  Or as I actually go on more.

properties.name: Abandoned civic building of some sort
properties.description: Posted by Jasonsouth phillycirca 1996, hopped the fence, found a ladder, climbed onto a 2nd story balcony in the back, and discovered the most amazingly decrepit grand domed central hall i\'ve even seen. Chandelier hanging in the dusty calm air above a floor strewn with debris.

properties.name: Broke down in vw bus
properties.description: Posted by JasonAaron Campbell and I, circa 1991, driving back from Toronto. Flat tire in some highland desert like corner of Wyoming. Couldn\'t budge the lugnuts, literally bent 2 tire irons and the wheel was spinning under pressure, despite NOT BEING ON A JACK! We piled all out luggage in the front of the bus and had one another sit in the driver\'s seat in an attempt to offset this weight issue, no luck. We decided to hitch it back many miles to some town. The minivan family that stopped would only let one of us in (cautious). When he got back with a can of WD-40 he told me of his adventures trying to catch road wandering cattle, to ride one, because there were NO CARS COMING. After many hours of waiting, a park/forest ranger type guy came along, and called us a tow truck from over 100 miles away. What a day. Oh yeah, the tire shop said that the wheel had been mounted so tight with an air compressor that no human would really have ever been able to get that thing off. great.

properties.name: Cannes Film Festival
properties.description: Posted by Jason  cannes, franceWent with an employee of a french film distribution firm, got less than legit passes, whisked into parties, lounged in the warm sea. Met some girls who invited me back to Bordeaux with them.

properties.name: Cenote Dzitnup - Lake in a cave
properties.description: Posted by Jason between Tulum and Coba, MexicoSomewhat creepy underground lake with natural spotlight and tons of stalagtites. Local girls swimming in gowns, villagers selling crafts, young boys offering to watch your car for you.

properties.name: Coney Island Reunion
properties.description: Posted by Jason spring 2005

properties.name: Giant shard of broken glass in my food @ Leonardo's Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Jason 1245 West University Avenue, Gainesville, FL, 32601i took a pretty big bite, and luckily, felt something hard in my mouth before really starting to chew, i slowly pulled it out to find the rim of a pint glass baked in the pizza. a compaint got me a free tshirt, a new pizza and a couple pitchers of beer, big whoop, i was pretty bummed. i was with a couple ladies though, so i had to keep my cool.

properties.name: Links at Spanish Bay, The
properties.description: Posted by Jason This facility, which was named to GOLF MAGAZINE\'s 2002 list of "Gold Medal Resorts," features a Scottish links-style course. The course is located alongside the ocean, and has many great views of the coastline.

properties.name: Month long crash pad in Paris
properties.description: Posted by Jasoncanal st martin, 10e, paris, franceA friend was going out of town for a while, she let me occupy her flat. Just spent the time skateboarding around, tattooed a few people i\'d meet, eating bread, cheese, olives and grapefruit juice nonstop. It was summer and humid. She had a bike I used as well, long distance adventures, getting super lost. Nights were particularly spectacular, sitting on the canal, musicians, lovers and dealers all taking advantage of the warm air.

properties.name: Moosejaw, Saskatchewan, Tundra, Vert ramp
properties.description: Posted by Jason south central canadaIn the late 80\'s a group of skaters from Portland travelled to a small town outside of Moosejaw to ride a vert ramp in a giant church jam packed with young rural canadian teenagers. There were indoor fireworks. Lance Mountain was also there, skating. Most of the guys weren\'t really vert skaters, in fact, they were pretty much terrible, in fact I was one of them. Some of us, the good vert skaters, had injured themselves during practice. The rest of us tried our best not to bail while doing rock&rolls, fakie popouts, little mini ollie nosegrinds, and ollies not quite out of the top. The crowd just kept cheering \'mctwist, mctwist, mctwist\'. We just let Lance do his thing.

properties.name: North Van old school snakerun
properties.description: Posted by Jason This park has been here since 1976. It\'s probably one of the first city skateparks.

properties.name: Pike Falls Cabin
properties.description: Posted by Jason The amazingly relaxing vacation cabin. Thanks Betsy!!!

properties.name: Practical Joke on tourists
properties.description: Posted by JasonI went through a big \'rock balancing\' phase many years ago, and during that phase I was traveling around Mexico. Finding myself at a far off edge of the ruins in Tulum, I balanced up a few big stones, then realized they looked very \'in place\' here, that they almost looked like they had been there for a long time. So, I backed off to a hidden spot and watched several groups of tourists come and stare at the pile, stand in front of it, take photos in front of it etc. Then one poor old guy thought he\'d see how stable this thing was, how it had survived over time, his finger slowly reached out and the moment he made even light contact, the precarious balance was upset and the whole pile toppled into a dust cloud faster than anyone could blink. The man and his group looked nervously all around for the approaching federales, but only saw me, squatting 100 yards away covering my laugh with a dusty hand.

properties.name: Slept on large gravel beach, after stumbling upon a mystery rave.
properties.description: Posted by Jason   East end of the Beach, Brighton, UKTook a bus to Brighton with Betsy on a whim, walked around, rocked the little skatepark, scoped the historical photos of the Mods vs. the Rockers, then we strolled off down the beach to find a place to crash for the night. Found a small but energetic rave, fell asleep on the really uncomfy stones of this British beach.

properties.name: Spent time with 2 nutty art students
properties.description: Posted by Jason bordeaux, franceOne slept in a broken child\'s crib, one slept in the attic, the apartment seemed to span through the various forgotten spaces of several adjoining buildings. Lots of coffee, bread and beans.

properties.name: Tallbike Faculty (at least it was here in 2005)
properties.description: Posted by Jason  Oostzaanstraat, near WesterparkThe ever inspiring cluster of dedicated hard working tall bike innovators who keep the culture alive and thriving in amsterdam, where the saying goes "if you\'re normal, that\'s weird enough." This pack can be seen jousting in the Vondelpark most weekends in the summer. Great fun. Their family tallbike has hosted our family on a few rides, one you can see here.

properties.name: Went to a small sheep town in Wales to Tattoo
properties.description: Posted by Jason went on offer of a tattoo gig, saw sheep, they didn\'t actually have an opening for another 6 weeks or so. Bum steer.

properties.name: austin trip for napster
properties.description: Posted by Jasonresearch trip, emiko was projectile vomiting at just a few months old, did critical mass with 5 people

properties.name: brock's house
properties.description: Posted by Jasondrove from miami to collect brock\'s stuff and drove back, going through mississippi was soo strange

properties.name: chiapas
properties.description: Posted by Jasonone year after zapatista uprising, tons of bullet holes all over san cristobal

properties.name: chicken nopale and french fries taco
properties.description: Posted by Jason mexico city, mexicobelieve it or not, this unexpected combo was the best street taco i\'ve ever had. some art school kids brought me here once.

properties.name: jalapa
properties.description: Posted by Jasonup the hills from veracruz, secret deadly waterfalls amidst coffee plantations, artsy city, cinema culture

properties.name: prince george
properties.description: Posted by Jasonmore skate adventures

properties.name: puerto rico , rain forest
properties.description: Posted by Jason  cocqui frogs, skinny dipping, paradise. 8 months preggy with emiko, then saw nathan and dre in st thomas

properties.name: slovakia, vysokie tatrys
properties.description: Posted by Jason snowboarding trip with mr. brother eric, flew to bratislava, train to mountains. Slovakia seemed like a Russian Mexico.

properties.name: tijuana and surrounding villages
properties.description: Posted by Jasonwent with skatechurch to do flood releif home building for refugees, but also got professional clown training and did guerrilla circus performances in cillages for happy kids c. 1990

properties.name: ventimiglia, italian riviera
properties.description: Posted by Jason birthday trip from amsterdam, 3 days of sun, beaches, drives into ancient mountians villages, food, amazing

properties.name: visiting the allen family
properties.description: Posted by Jason brockton, maA few trips up to hang with di\'s extended family.
